title: 403 error messages in OPB Controller Log
content:
The OPB controller log contains the following error：

ERROR [Fetch XIE Tasks Executor Service-1-thread] (HttpClientRequestInvoker.java:107) HTTP failure! URI: https://shc-sma-cd41.hpeswlab.net:443/xie/v1/namespaces/555500000/agents/28c7fb1b821b766518bda268/task/100/list; Status: HTTP/1.1 403

Cause

In addition to the OPB Remote Agent role, the integration user needs the Tenant Admin role when using Rest Executor 2.0 to invoke the integration engine. This issue occurs if the integration user isn't assigned this role.

Solution

Ignore this error if your integration doesn't use Rest Executor 2.0.

If your OPB integration uses Rest Executor 2.0, assign the Tenant Admin role to the integration user. See How to use On-Premises Bridge agents on Linux or How to use On-Premises Bridge agents on Windows for help.
